description: The nova/api/openstack/wsgi.py modules do not allow for a Resource to actually call a custom DictSerializer action
title: OSAPI: custom controller action serialization methods are ignored

comments.content: The nova/api/openstack/wsgi.py modules do not allow for a Resource to actually call a custom DictSerializer action
